title: What music is actually popular in Korea? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are many genres of music in Korea that are not very unknown to global listeners. For example, Korean Indie music  Ballad music like Sam Smith kind of music  Soft Hip Hop  Rock ballad  There are too many, but it seems dance music in a group, called K-pop dominates the Korean media. If you have a specific genre you like, I think it is much better to dig into the genre of the music you like in Korean music rather than listen to K-pop music which you can listen to easily from media.
K pop. One of the bastions of Korean culture in recent times, it has become a purveyor of modern Korean ways and identity. Trot. Korean folk music, and one of the unique generic Korean styles.
